EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Archmage: Master of Magic
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Through extensive training and countless hours of study, you have mastered the application of metamagic feats to your spells. You gain +4 Intelligence, +20 Universal Spell Power, +5 Spellcraft, and all metamagic feats cost 1 fewer spell point to use. (Heighten Spell costs 1 fewer spell point per level of heightening.)

EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your damaging spells generate [10/20/30]% less hate than they normally would, making enemies less likely to attack you.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Archmage: Energy of the Scholar
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your studies have increased your maximum Spell Points by an additional [30/60/100].

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Archmage: Traditionalist Caster
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[3/6/10] Universal Spell Power when wielding an Orb or Staff.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Archmage: Spell Critical: Elemental and Force I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your Acid, Cold, Electric, Fire, Force and Untyped damage spells have an additional 1% chance to critically hit. Actually 3% Force.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Archmage: Wand and Scroll Mastery
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[25/50/75]% effectiveness from your wands, scrolls, and other items that cast spells, and +[1/2/3] to the save DC of your offensive wands. Taking Wand and Scroll Mastery in one enhancement tree will block its availability in other enhancement trees.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Archmage: Arcane Bolt
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Spell Like Ability: Arcane Bolt You fire a bolt of raw energy from your finger that deals 1d6+2 hit points of Force damage per caster level to a single target.
